title: Blade trap
data:
{{obsolete}}{{flavour|A massive scythe-like blade hidden in a slit, with a counterweight that acts as a pendulum.}}

[[File:Blade trap.png]]

A '''blade trap''' is a mechanical [[trap]] which, when stepped on, causes a huge blade to swing up and slice you, causing 48-76 physical damage to you if it hits (monsters take only 10-38 damage). It is the most powerful of all the mechanical traps, and well worth being cautious around. Unlike other mechanical traps, blade traps don't use ammunition and cannot be destroyed.

==History==
*All mechanical traps were removed in [[0.27]].
